p: RAW264.7 macrophage cells were seeded in 6-well plates and grown in medium containing 50 µg/ml oxLDL (Invitrogen) with or without HDE. After a 48-h incubation, the cells were stained with acridine orange (2.5 µg/ml) and Hoecsht 33432 solution at room temperature for 20 min. Cells were fixed with 4% PFA and mounted on glass slides. The images were captured under a Zeiss LSM 880 confocal microscope.
